title: Undead

properties.name: description
properties.value: Undead are monsters or NPCs in RuneScape that are dead, but not gone; they have often been revived by a necromancer or created purely from magic. Undead encompasses everything from reanimated corpses to ghosts and spirits. Generally, most undead monsters are affected by the Strength and Attack-based enhancements of the salve amulet or salve amulet (e) as well as the Crumble Undead spell. The majority of the Undead are found in the more inauspicious of RuneScape's regions, such as Morytania, the Wilderness, and numerous dungeons.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:UndeadThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Undead
This article is about the race. For the attribute, see Undead (attribute).

Undead are monsters or NPCs in RuneScape that are dead, but not gone; they have often been revived by a necromancer or created purely from magic. Undead encompasses everything from reanimated corpses to ghosts and spirits. Generally, most undead monsters are affected by the Strength and Attack-based enhancements of the salve amulet or salve amulet (e) as well as the Crumble Undead spell. The majority of the Undead are found in the more inauspicious of RuneScape's regions, such as Morytania, the Wilderness, and numerous dungeons.

Monsters[edit | edit source]

The following monsters are undead:

  • Aberrant spectre
  • Ankou
  • Banshee
  • Crawling Hand
  • Ghast
  • Ghost
  • Mummy
  • Revenants
  • Shade
  • Skeleton
  • Skogre
  • Summoned Zombie
  • Tortured soul
  • Undead chicken
  • Undead cow
  • Undead one
  • Zogre
  • Zombified Spawn
  • Zombie
  • Zombie rat

Horrors[edit | edit source]

Some of the infamous nasties of the undead:

  • Vet'ion
  • The Barrows brothers (the Salve Amulet and the Crumble undead spell do not work when fighting the Barrows brothers)
    • Ahrim the Blighted
    • Dharok the Wretched
    • Guthan the Infested
    • Karil the Tainted
    • Torag the Corrupted
    • Verac the Defiled
  • Pestilent Bloat
  • Tree spirit (Lost city)
  • Mi-Gor
  • Treus Dayth
  • Nazastarool
  • Slash Bash
  • Ulfric
  • Vorkath

{{external|rs|rsc}}{{otheruses|the race|the attribute|Undead (attribute)}}
'''Undead''' are monsters or [[NPC]]s in ''[[RuneScape]]'' that are dead, but not gone; they have often been revived by a [[Necromancer (disambiguation)|necromancer]] or created purely from [[magic]]. Undead encompasses everything from reanimated corpses to ghosts and spirits. Generally, most undead monsters are affected by the [[Strength]] and [[Attack]]-based enhancements of the [[salve amulet]] or [[salve amulet (e)]] as well as the [[Crumble Undead]] spell. The majority of the Undead are found in the more inauspicious of RuneScape's regions, such as [[Morytania]], the [[Wilderness]], and numerous [[dungeons]].

==Monsters==
The following monsters are undead:

*[[Ankou]]
*[[Banshee]]

*[[Skogre]]
*[[Summoned Zombie]]
*[[Tortured soul]]
*[[Undead chicken]]
*[[Undead cow]]
*[[Undead one]]
*[[Zogre]]
*[[Zombified Spawn]]
*[[Zombie]]
*[[Zombie rat]]

==Horrors==
Some of the infamous nasties of the undead:
*[[Vet'ion]]
*The [[Barrows brothers]] (the [[Salve Amulet]] and the [[Crumble undead]] spell do '''not''' work when fighting the Barrows brothers)
